snippet.title: Postitguess.io trailer - Who am I / hedbanz online game
snippet.description:
Have you ever played this game where you write a famous character on a note and place it on your friend forehead and he have to guess it quickly ?

Game known famously as "Hedbanz / What's on my head / What Am I / Sticky head note game"

🚀 The first online version of this party game is now out ! From 2 to 8 players, directly in web browser for free

➡️ https://postitguess.io ⬅️

🏷️ How to play 

It's basically the same way as skribbl or gartic phone if you already played it

📞 Invite your friends to a voice call (Discord/Zoom/Skype)
🦹 Choose a character for someone to guess that everyone knows
❓ Ask quick questions to find your character
💬 Other players can only answer you with "yes" or "no"
🎯 Try to guess your character as soon as you have an idea
